paper_abstract: In this paper, the degrees to which a mapping is continuous, open or closed are introduced in (L, M)-fuzzy topological spaces by using implication operation and some characterizations of them are presented. Also their relationships with the degrees of compactness, connectedness, T-1 and T-2 axioms in (L, M)-fuzzy topological spaces are discussed.
paper_title: Degree of continuity for mappings of (L, M)-fuzzy topological spaces
